amendment.description: Senate amendment inserts a complete new text entitled "Eliminate, Neutralize, and Disrupt Wildlife Trafficking Act of 2016" and appears on page H5741 of the Congressional Record of September 21, 2016.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 21 printed in House Report 114-742 to allow the VA to also use hearing aid specialists, who are more available, and are qualified to fit, program, adjust, and repair hearing aids.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Duffy amendment (A020) Agreed to by recorded vote: 423 - 1 (Roll no. 517).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Duffy amendment (A020) Agreed to by recorded vote: 423 - 1 (Roll no. 517).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A020) offered by Mr. Duffy.
